concept.title: Tutorial Introduction
concept.shortdesc: The tutorial application demonstrates basic features of by walking through the code of a rudimentary social networking application built on .

section.p: The tutorial shows you how to kill JVMs without loss of service, add more storage dynamically while the application is running, and provide low latency access to your data. The tutorial uses the command-line utility, gfsh, to start locators and servers.

p.note: The tutorial demonstrates how to use these features with 's Java API.
